Initialize Git

  • git init
  • git add --all
  • git commit -m "First commit"
  • git remote add origin https://github.com/mobile-michel/hello-world.git
  • git branch -M main
  • git push -u origin main
  • username: mobile-michel
  • password: ghp_****
